comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Quote from: Zalima Zohair on June 16, 2022, 06:25:22 PMBy participating in this campaign, you run the risk of losing your efforts for nothing.Review the previous campaign he managed and how the weekly payment of the participants was delayed while he was inactive not responding to payment claims.The UniJoin campaign has been escrowed by Royse777 see the wallet above they have pocketed the funds there, so I think the payments will be on time every week.Apart from the Bitlucy issue I don't know because I didn't follow its development.

comments.author: Zalima Zohair
comments.body: Quote from: salad daging on June 16, 2022, 06:38:48 PMQuote from: Zalima Zohair on June 16, 2022, 06:25:22 PMBy participating in this campaign, you run the risk of losing your efforts for nothing.Review the previous campaign he managed and how the weekly payment of the participants was delayed while he was inactive not responding to payment claims.The UniJoin campaign has been escrowed by Royse777 see the wallet above they have pocketed the funds there, so I think the payments will be on time every week.Apart from the Bitlucy issue I don't know because I didn't follow its development.By participating in a scam project, he has destoyed the reputation he built for years and is therefore no longer reliable enough to be treated with the same credibility that it was.It should be noted that this member may disappear without reason for days and be late in paying the subscribers dues, and he actually did this in the previous campaign that he was running which unfortunately he was a part of its team.It would be better to assign another trusted escrow from the forum to take over the weekly payment process on time.

comments.author: posi
comments.body: @Zalima Zohair, you can open your own thread to warn people, why are you spamming in a campaign thread?Royse777 said the funds are escrowed by him, so now let the participants choose do they work with Royse777 or not.Did you make this account for this reason? Possessing a low mindset.Now come about reputation,Royse777 didn't scam anyone, so the reputation is still fine. He/she tried to bring a new casino to this community but unfortunately failed. now trying his best to resolve the problem. No one knows the future.

comments.author: Tutte
comments.body: Quote from: posi on June 16, 2022, 08:51:44 PM@Zalima Zohair, you can open your own thread to warn people, why are you spamming in a campaign thread?Royse777 said the funds are escrowed by him, so now let the participants choose do they work with Royse777 or not.Did you make this account for this reason? Possessing a low mindset.Now come about reputation,Royse777 didn't scam anyone, so the reputation is still fine. He/she tried to bring a new casino to this community but unfortunately failed. now trying his best to resolve the problem. No one knows the future.Stop defending him just because... promoting a scam project knowingly means you are a part of that scam as well, isn't that the same reason why 1xbit campaign is being red tag plus the participants? Why should he get special treatment?He/she deserves all the red tag from anyone who feels red tag should be given. Because of his/her clumsiness and bad management, all the participants of lunaland (an alt campaign managed by Royse777) didn't get a single payment despite how successful the project was back then, it was suppose to be a weekly payment but rosey never follow up to ensure participants of signature get their weekly payment,  he rarely answered questions in the bounty telegram group, instead of sincerely apologise for the mismanagement of the campaign he threatened to red tag anyone who dare challenge his/her incompetence (not to mention he/she got paid regardless).Participants of that bounty never reported Royse777 because of the influence he/she has here in the forum. This is another way of scam, not necessarily direct scam. I would be red tagging him/her if I have the power. What is worth doing is worth doing well.

And confirm it to the next posts.Quote from: Tutte on June 17, 2022, 06:13:37 AMhe threatened to red tag anyone who dare challenge his/her incompetence (not to mention he/she got paid regardless).Participants of that bounty never reported Royse777 because of the influence he/she has here in the forum. What is worth doing is worth doing well.If fear was something worked for you then this is the right time for you to create a scam accusation, I was never been in such bad shape before, so use it. People can have their opinions freely. I would suggest you to create a new thread of anything that you have against me. In the accusation board you have better chances than here.The "red tag anyone who dare  challenge his/her incompetence" was completely exaggerated by the way. I still have not used my DT power to abuse it against anyone even when I have many changes where I could and took the unethical advantage. I hope the community have seen it in me before.
